languages.text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary Whenever the wearer's ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the bonded souls effect until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Bonded Souls: the wearer gains a +2% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to damage for each stack of bonded souls.

traits.locale_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary Whenever the wearer's ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the bonded souls {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Bonded Souls: the wearer gains a +2% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to damage for each stack of bonded souls.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary Whenever the wearer's ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the bonded souls effect until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Bonded Souls: the wearer gains a +2% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to damage for each stack of bonded souls.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary Whenever the wearer's ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the bonded souls effect until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Bonded Souls: the wearer gains a +2% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to damage for each stack of bonded souls.

languages.text: 需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}自由主义{/g}——信奉者 每当装备者的盟友受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，装备者获得1层“灵魂结合”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}，持续至下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}为止。 灵魂结合：每层“灵魂结合”效果使装备者造成的所有伤害提高2%。
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary Whenever the wearer's ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the bonded souls {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Bonded Souls: the wearer gains a +2% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to damage for each stack of bonded souls.

traits.locale_text: 需要信念：人道主义——信奉者 每当装备者的盟友受到伤害时，装备者获得1层“灵魂结合”效果，持续至下个回合为止。 灵魂结合：每层“灵魂结合”效果使装备者造成的所有伤害提高2%。

languages.text: Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g} — поборник Когда союзник получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, персонаж получает +1 уровень эффекта "сплетение душ", который действует до конца его следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Сплетение душ: персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +2% к урону за каждый уровень эффекта.
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary Whenever the wearer's ally receives {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the bonded souls {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Bonded Souls: the wearer gains a +2% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to damage for each stack of bonded souls.

traits.locale_text: Требуется: Благодеяние — поборник. Когда союзник получает урон, персонаж получает +1 уровень эффекта "сплетенные души", который действует до конца его следующего хода. Сплетенные души: персонаж получает бонус +2% к урону за каждый уровень эффекта.

Требуется: Благодеяние — поборник. Когда союзник получает урон, персонаж получает +1 уровень эффекта "сплетенные души", который действует до конца его следующего хода. Сплетенные души: персонаж получает бонус +2% к урону за каждый уровень эффекта.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g} ― 信奉者が必要 使用者の味方が{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を食らうたび、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が終わるまで、使用者は絆の魂{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}のスタックを+1獲得する 絆の魂：使用者は絆の魂のスタックにダメージを与える+2%の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary Whenever the wearer's ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the bonded souls {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Bonded Souls: the wearer gains a +2% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to damage for each stack of bonded souls.

traits.locale_text: ベネボレンティア ― 信奉者が必要 使用者の味方がダメージを受けたらいつでも、次のターンが終わるまで使用者は絆の魂効果のスタックを+1獲得する。 絆の魂：使用者は絆の魂のスタックにダメージを与える+2％のボーナスを得る。

languages.text: Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclasta{/g}: Devoto Cuando un aliado del portador sufre {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, el portador gana +1 acumulación del efecto Almas entrelazadas hasta el final de su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Almas entrelazadas: el portador gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +2 % al daño por cada acumulación de Almas entrelazadas.
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary Whenever the wearer's ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the bonded souls effect until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Bonded Souls: the wearer gains a +2% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to damage for each stack of bonded souls.

traits.locale_text: Requiere Benevolentia: Devoto Cuando un aliado del portador sufre daño, el portador gana +1 acumulación del {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} Almas entrelazadas hasta el final de su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Almas entrelazadas: el portador gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +2 % al daño por cada acumulación de Almas entrelazadas.

languages.text: Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ikonoklast{/g} — Geweihter. Wenn der Verbündete des Trägers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleidet, erhält der Träger bis zum Ende seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} +1 Stapel "Verbundene Seelen". Verbundene Seelen: Der Träger erhält für jeden Stapel "Verbundene Seelen" einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +2 % auf Schaden.
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary Whenever the wearer's ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the bonded souls effect until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Bonded Souls: the wearer gains a +2% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to damage for each stack of bonded souls.

traits.locale_text: Erfordert Benevolentia – Geweihter. Jedes Mal, wenn der Verbündete des Trägers Schaden erleidet, erhält der Träger bis zum Ende seines nächsten Zuges +1 Stapel des Effekts Verbundene Seelen. Verbundene Seelen: Der Träger erhält pro Stapel Verbundene Seelen einen Bonus von +2 % auf Schaden.

languages.text: Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}iconoclaste{/g} — Disciple. Chaque fois qu'un allié de l'utilisateur subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, l'utilisateur bénéficie de +1 cumul de l'effet Âmes liées jusqu'à la fin de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Âmes liées : l'utilisateur obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +2 % de dégâts par cumul d'Âmes liées.
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary Whenever the wearer's ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the bonded souls effect until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Bonded Souls: the wearer gains a +2% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to damage for each stack of bonded souls.

traits.locale_text: Requiert Benevolentia — Disciple. Chaque fois qu'un allié de l'utilisateur subit des dégâts, l'utilisateur bénéficie de +1 cumul de l'effet Âmes Liées jusqu'à la fin de son tour suivant. Âmes Liées : l'utilisateur reçoit un bonus de +2 % de dégâts par cumul d'Âmes Liées.
